author: Kwanwoo Jun
title: Lotte Group Chairman Resigns From Its Japanese Holding Company
text:
SEOUL—Lotte Group Chairman Shin Dong-bin stepped down as head of the conglomerate’s Japanese holding company after being jailed last week for bribery, the latest twist in a broader corruption scandal that has rocked South Korea.
Mr. Shin’s resignation Wednesday could reignite a bitter dispute with his older brother over control of South Korea’s fifth-largest conglomerate. Lotte operates businesses ranging from chemicals to snacks, supermarkets, entertainment and hotels.
